fields.summary: Updated sdk not showing in build properties

comments.body:
Hello [~jrf7243], Titanium studio is no longer is in service. Please use Appcelerator studio from now on. For installing Appcelerator Studio

1. Log in to https://platform.appcelerator.com/
2. Click the icon in the the top-left corner and select studio.
3. Download the installer or ZIP file for your operating system
4. Launch the downloaded installer
5. Follow the instruction on Download Appcelerator CLI page.
6. Install CLI, Node.js.

For more info on installation and configuration follow this [link|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Installation_and_Configuration]. 

Hope this helps, Thanks.
